title: About Brian Schrader
author: Brian Schrader
content:
I'm a self-taught software developer, and Bioinformatician (with a B.S. in Aerospace Engineering) living in San Diego, CA. This is my little home on the internet, built from scratch using nothing but TextWrangler and Terminal.

All posts are written in Markdown. If you want to see the original markdown text, just add "article.md" after the "/" in the URL.

Contact Me

You can contact me either by email at brian@biteofanapple.com though I tend to be slow at responding to email, or on Twitter @sonicrocketman where I'm usually pretty active.
